column1: Funeral services are scheduled for Wednesday
column3: 2015 at 1:00 PM at Morgan's Funeral Home in Princeton with Bro. Len Young officiating assisted by Bro. Robin Redd. Burial will follow in the Creekmur Cemetery.   Visitation will be held from 9:00 AM until 1:00 PM Wednesday at Morgan's Funeral Home in Princeton.   Pallbearers will be Tanner McGregor
